column4: hi, I would like to install a specific version of Ruby on my ubuntu machine via terminal. How can I install ruby 1.9.2 rc2
follow the installation instructions on ruby-lang.org or use something like rvm (http://rvm.beginrescueend.com/)
I'm not aware of any DEB packages for the ruby 1.9.2 release candidates but you might find some
ok looks like rvm it is
